name: Creede
description:
This is a tech demo for Creede

Millions of people have disappeared from all over the world. It happened so quickly that news channels and radio stations stopped before they could get information out to explain what was happening. In Creede, Colorado, the National Guard arrived to build a shelter for the remaining population in the area.

One night, they left. After that, no one has disappeared in over a month. You are Calvin Hetch, an ex-military park ranger that seems to be the only authority figure left in Creede. After a man goes missing, everyone assumes it's happening again. It's up to you to get people to the shelter and possibly find out what is happening and why it's happening

  • Vast open world
  • character interaction
  • living environment
  • day and night system
  • dynamic wind system
  • crafting
  • survival elements
  • equipment system
